mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id, category_id, circulation_chk, circulation_content, preparations_plan, relay_plan, reword_type, reword_info, required_documents_orgName, required_documents_Name, required_documents_url, fees_chk, policy_agreement, status, reg_date FROM tb_audit ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_audit SET
member_id = #{member_id}, circulation_chk = #{circulation_chk}, circulation_content = #{circulation_content}, preparations_plan = #{preparations_plan}, relay_plan = #{relay_plan}, reword_type = #{reword_type}, reword_info = #{reword_info}, required_documents_orgName = #{required_documents_orgName}, required_documents_Name = #{required_documents_Name}, required_documents_url = #{required_documents_url}, fees_chk = #{fees_chk}, policy_agreement = #{policy_agreement}
mapper.update: UPDATE SET tb_audit id=#{id}, member_id=#{member_id}, category_id=#{category_id}, circulation_chk=#{circulation_chk}, circulation_content=#{circulation_content}, preparations_plan=#{preparations_plan}, relay_plan=#{relay_plan}, reword_type=#{reword_type}, reword_info=#{reword_info}, required_documents_orgName=#{required_documents_orgName}, required_documents_Name=#{required_documents_Name}, required_documents_url=#{required_documents_url}, fees_chk=#{fees_chk}, policy_agreement=#{policy_agreement}, status=#{status}, reg_date=#{reg_date} WHERE id=#{id}
